:::Torca:::

Torca: Dont worry about it Klant.  You'll get more powerful soon, and 
i'll help you out.  As soon as this battles over, im going ot give 
something very special to you, and it will imporve your perfomance as 
a warrior.  Now go inside and get to a CR before you get yourself 
killed.





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Klant: One...missile...and this happened...
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Alloran2@a... 
>   To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
>   Sent: Monday, December 18, 2000 4:36 PM
>   Subject: Re: The Battle Ends, and the Carnage Begins
> 
> 
>   :::Torca/Sky Lynx/Ratchet/Sideswipe/Orion:: 
> 
>   ::Torca dodges all of the laser blasts.  the granade misses him, 
but some of 
>   the sonic energy hits him.  He modifies his dorsal gun to nail 
gun mode and 
>   fires 9 nails at Breakdown, 8 at Dark One, and 8 at Astral.  he 
sees Klant 
>   crawling back to him:: 
>   Torca: You alright Klant? if not, get into a CR chamber, because 
you look 
>   pretty beaten up. 
>   ::Sky Lynx flies to escape the fireballs, but one hits him 
anyway.  He only 
>   gets hit by one ion disk.  he dodges the shots from Ares.  He 
fired 2 missles 
>   from one gun at Pyro, 1 missle from the other at Manterror, and 1 
missle at 
>   Ares.  Ratchet transformed to robot mode and escaped most of the 
shots, 
>   thoguh some hit him in the arms.  Ratchet jumped out of the way 
of the connon 
>   blast, and ended up being hit by some of Fenox's laser bolts.  He 
fired 15 
>   shots from each of his blasters at Scavenger and launched 1 
explosive tusk 
>   blades at Sixshot, and one at Fenox.  Sideswipe escapes the sword 
blade.  He 
>   got hit by 2 stinger missles and 5 optic blasts(between Injector 
and 
>   Bumblebee). He fired 25 shots at Demon Wulf, 1 missle at 
Injector, and 1 
>   missle at Bumblebee.  Orion destroyed the missles with ones of 
his own and 
>   fired a missle, hoping to hit Double Punch.  He evaded the shots 
fr! om! Ares 
>   and fired a missle at him.  He escapes the darts and fires 25 
rapid fire 
>   optic blasts at Starlight::
